tool_description: Optimizes time distribution across cleaning tasks based on available time windows, task priorities, and efficiency considerations.

available_hours_per_week.description: Total weekly time available for cleaning

preferred_session_length.description: Preferred cleaning session duration in minutes

maximum_session_length.description: Maximum cleaning session duration in minutes

task_priorities.description: List of task IDs in priority order

energy_level_preference.description: When you have most energy (morning, afternoon, evening)

allow_task_splitting.description: Whether long tasks can be split across sessions

weekend_ratio.description: Fraction of cleaning done on weekends (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid available_hours_per_week: Must be positive number
Invalid session lengths: Preferred must be less than maximum, both positive
Empty task_priorities: At least one task ID must be provided
Invalid energy_level_preference: Must be one of [morning, afternoon, evening]
Invalid break_time_between_tasks: Must be non-negative integer
Invalid weekend_ratio: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0
usage: Input your available time and preferences to get an optimized allocation of cleaning tasks across your schedule.

overflow_tasks.description: Tasks that couldn't fit in available time
